Commands.Esuna: Cleanses the targeted ally of all debuffs  Raises all party members' BRV by 1.2x Initial BRV  Low Action Delay
Commands.Cheer: Grants Fayth's Protection for 5 turns.  Raises target's BRV based on Yuna's Attack then increases it further it by 1.5.  Fayth's Protection raises Initial BRV and Defense by 10%.
Commands.Base Attack: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Attack for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Grand Summon: Summons 「Valefor」 for 6 turns  Triggers 「Energy Blast」:  - 10-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + single target HP attack  - Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  - BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  - Deals 50% HP damage to other targets  - Grants 「Valefor's Blessing」 for 6 turns   While 「Valefor」 is active:  - Turns 「Grand Summon」 to 「Energy Blast」  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「Sonic Wings」  - Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 to 「Energy Ray」  - When 「Energy Blast」 is used, 「Valefor」 count is refreshed to 6 turns   「Valefor's Blessing」 has the following effects:  - Raises Max BRV and Attack  - Grants party BRV regen   「Sonic Wings」 has the following effects:  - Raises BRV based on Initial BRV  - Deals a 2-HIT magic BRV+HP attack   「Energy Ray」 has the following effects:  - Raises BRV based on Attack  - Deals a 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  - BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  - HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies

Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%
Passives.Esuna Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Esuna
Passives.Esuna BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Esuna
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces Action Delay when using abilities continuously
Passives.Start Veil: Moderately raises Debuff Evasion Rate for 3 actions when the battle starts
Passives.Cheer Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Esuna
Passives.Fayth's Doctrine: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves HP value at 1
Passives.Buff Base&Attack Up: Slightly raises Initial BRV and moderately raises Attack while buffed
Passives.Esuna Extend: When using Esuna:- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Initial BRV- Extends target's buffs by 1 turn (only once)
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Cheer Extend: -  Cheer  use +1When using  Cheer :- Slightly improves the effects of  Fayth's Protection - Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Slightly restores the target's HP- Extends the duration of granted buffs by 3 turns
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party's Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Base Attack Extend: When using  Base Attack :- Slightly improves Initial BRV Up and Attack Up effects

Weapons.Astral Rod CP: 15: When using  Esuna :- Applies its effects to all party members
Weapons.Lullaby Rod CP: 35: When using  Cheer :- Grants the BRV gain to all allies- Improves the effects of  Fayth's Protection - Grants  Spira's Protection  and  Small Attack Up  to all alliesTurns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+  while  Fayth's Protection  is active Spira's Protection  grants BRV Regen and raises Max BRV
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Base Attack  use +1Duration of  Base Attack  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Ambra Rod CP: 15: Turns  BRV Attack  to a Thunder-elemental BRV attackGrants a low probability of gaining  Small Speed Up  for 3 turns after using  BRV Attack
Weapons.Mirage Rod CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Grand Summon
